    • Uses of CouponSystemException in connectionPool

      Methods in connectionPool that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.clousAllConnection()
      in this method first the system will stop giving connections and wait for all the connections to come back and than close them all .
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      all the methods use connection that thay get from this method .
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      user cannot create a new connection pool . only use an instance of the only one .

    • Uses of CouponSystemException in dao.db

      Methods in dao.db that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyDaoDb.addCompanyCoupon(long couponId, long companyId)
      adding a coupon (made by company) to there join table
      void CustomerDaoDb.addCustomerCoupon(long couponId, long customerId)
      When a customer buy coupon it will be save in a table in the database for him to use .
      void CompanyDaoDb.companyCouponAppdate(long companyId, long couponId)
      this is additional methods to handle the join tabels
      void CustomerDaoDb.creat(Customer customer)
      * every customer get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the customer.
      void CompanyDaoDb.create(Company company)
      the company will get the id from the tabel and not from the user so its will be unique
      void CouponDaoDb.create(Coupon coupon)
      every coupon get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the coupon.
      void CustomerDaoDb.customerCouponAppdate(long customerId, long couponId)
      from this method on this is additional methods all those 3 methods are handling the join tables.
      java.util.Collection<Company> CompanyDaoDb.getAllCompanies()
      in this method the user can get all the existing companies in the system
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getAllCoupon()
      this method will get the user all the coupons in the system (of all the companies)
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerDaoDb.getAllCoupons()
      this method was writing so customers can see the coupon that they didn't purchased so they can buy theme
      java.util.Collection<Customer> CustomerDaoDb.getAllCustomers()
      this method will give the user all the customers in the system
      Company CompanyDaoDb.getCompany(long id)
      user give his company id and get the company details
      Coupon CouponDaoDb.getCoupon(long id)
      user can get a coupon by giving the id ( no user will give id in the system it will happened automatically in the facade (after logging in ).
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
      user can get all his coupons from a specific type
      long CouponDaoDb.getCouponId(java.lang.String title)
      this is additional methods that help user restore the coupon id .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerDaoDb.getCoupons(long customerId)
      this method give the user all the coupons in the system .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDaoDb.getCoupons(long companyId)
      this method will give the user HashSet with all the company coupons .
      Customer CustomerDaoDb.getCustomer(long id)
      user give an id and get the customer as an object. return customer.
      boolean CustomerDaoDb.isCouponExistByTitle(java.lang.String title)
      with this method we can check if a coupon title is already exist so every coupon will be unique .
      boolean CustomerDaoDb.logIn(java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String password)
      in the logIn if there any result from the database its true because a customer returned from the table.
      boolean CompanyDaoDb.logIn(java.lang.String companyName, java.lang.String password)
      the logIn method will return true if we get a result it mean the query is true to get company from the database
      void CompanyDaoDb.remove(Company company)
      remove company
      void CouponDaoDb.remove(Coupon coupon)
      method to remove a coupon.
      void CustomerDaoDb.remove(Customer customer)
      Removing customer from the system .
      void CompanyDaoDb.removeCompanyCoupons(long couponId)
      remove coupons from the join table of the coupons and companies
      void CustomerDaoDb.removeCustomerCoupons(long couponId)
      removing the coupons that the customer bought.
      long CompanyDaoDb.restorCompanyId(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String compPassword)
      this method can help users to restore id
      long CustomerDaoDb.restoreId(java.lang.String name)
      this will help customers get the customet_id if they lost it or something.
      void CompanyDaoDb.update(Company company)
      user cannot update the id
      void CouponDaoDb.update(Coupon coupon)
      user cannot update id
      void CustomerDaoDb.update(Customer customer)
      the update method can update only the name and the password.

    • Uses of CouponSystemException in facade

      Methods in facade that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.creatCustomer(Customer customer)
      only admin can create a customer (if the customer name is unique) .
      void AdminFacade.createCompany(Company company)
      only the admin can create a company user . only if the name chosen for the company is unique
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      we are checking that the coupon title is unique before we let the company create the coupon.
      java.util.Collection<Company> AdminFacade.getAllCompanies()
      user can get all the existing companies from this method.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getAllCoupons()
      this method return all the company coupons (by the company id that saved in the facade in the log-in)
      java.util.Collection<Customer> AdminFacade.getAllCustomers()
      this method give the user all the customers in the system .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchesedCoupons()
      this method allow the customer to get all the coupons that he bought.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchesedCouponsByPrice(double price)
      user can get all the coupon that he or she bought with lower or equal to the price he gave .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchesedCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      customer can get all the coupons that he or she bough from a specific type
      Company CompanyFacade.getCompany(long id) 
      Company AdminFacade.getCompany(long id) 
      Coupon CompanyFacade.getCoupon(long id)
      customer can get specific coupon
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByEndDate(java.sql.Date date)
      returns all the company coupons which ends in specific date and sooner.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByPrice(double price)
      returns all the company coupons from a specific price and lower
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByType(CouponType type)
      returns all the company coupons from a specific type
      Customer AdminFacade.getCustomer(long id)
      this method return customer after getting the customer id.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getUnperchesedCoupons()
      this is a method for customers to see all the coupons so they can perches theme
      boolean CustomerFacade.logIn(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      in this log in method we save the customer (that logged in )id so he or she can use all the other methods of the facade without retype the id every time .
      boolean CouponClientFacade.logIn(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password) 
      boolean CompanyFacade.logIn(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      this log-in store the user id in the facade
      boolean AdminFacade.logIn(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password) 
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a customer can purchase coupon after the checking that the customer didn't bought this coupon all-ready and if there coupons left and that the date isn't expired; the method will decrease the amount of coupon from the company balance after the customer purchase one
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company company)
      When this method is used the company and all her coupons and all the coupons that clients bought from her will be erased .
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      When a coupon is being removed its removed from the customers purchased coupons and from the table of the company coupons
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      in this method the system removing a customer and all his coupons .
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company company)
      can update only the email and the password .
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a company can only update the expiration date and the price of the coupon.
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method can only update the customer password .

      Methods in singleton that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CouponSystem.shutDown()
      the shutdown method will close all the open connection and stop the cleaner task.

    • Uses of CouponSystemException in webServices

      Methods in webServices that throw CouponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.creatCustomer(Customer customer, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user and save it in the data base .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.CreateCompany(Company comapny, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this rest method get (post method) company bean from the front-end and send it to the data base.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and save it in the database .
      java.lang.String LogIn.doPostRedirect(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pwd, java.lang.String usertype, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      in this login we get from the user: name,password and client-type.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.getAllCompanies(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method return all the companies that exist in the system and the companies details to the admin user.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Customer_Rest_Facade.getAllCoupons(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give all the customer coupons.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.getAllCoupons(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of all the company coupons to the company user .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.getAllCustomers(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method return all the customers that exist in the system and the customers details to the admin user.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Customer_Rest_Facade.getAllPurchesedCoupons(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the customer the details of all the coupons that he purchased (from the join table with his id )
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Customer_Rest_Facade.getAllPurchesedCouponsByPrice(double price, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      the user give price and get all the coupons that he parched in that price and lower .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Customer_Rest_Facade.getAllPurchesedCouponsByType(CouponType type, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the customer the details of all the coupons that he purchased (from the join table with his id ) from the type that he want (from the coupon-type enum in the beans package )
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.getCompany(long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      the admin user give the company id and gets the company details
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.getCoupon(long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the coupon details to the company.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.getCouponByEndDate(java.sql.Date date, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of the company coupons from specific end-date and before .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.getCouponByPrice(double price, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of the company coupons from the price the user choose and lower .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.getCouponByType(CouponType type, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the details of company coupons of specific type to the company user .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.getCustomer(long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      the admin user give the customer id and gets the customer details
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Customer_Rest_Facade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon and save his details in the join table in the data base with the coupon id as key .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.removeCompany(Company company, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this rest method get (delete method) company bean from the front-end and remove it from the data base.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and remove it from the database .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.removeCustomer(Customer customer, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user and remove it from the data base .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.updateCompany(Company company, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this rest method get(with put method) company bean from the front-end and update only the email an the password in the data base.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Company_Rest_Facade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon bean from the user and update only the end date and the price .
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> Admin_Rest_Facade.updateCustomer(Customer customer, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user update only the customer password in the date base
